  • Method Details

    • add

      boolean add(User user)
      Adds user to the database If User is already in the database (same username) then the method will return false
      Parameters:
      user -
      Returns:
      true if user could be added, if there was a user of the same name or user is null, false

      Returns:

    • getUserByUsername

      User getUserByUsername(String userName)
      Gets user with the corresponding name
      Parameters:
      userName -
      Returns:
      user with corresponding name, or null if no user was found

    • getIdByUsername

      Long getIdByUsername(String username)
      Gets Id by corresponding username
      Parameters:
      username -
      Returns:
      the ID of the user or null if there isn't a user in the database with that username or if there are more than one user

    • update

      boolean update(User user)
      Updates the user in database, make sure that the param has the original user ID set as its ID, the function will return null if not
      Parameters:
      user -
      Returns:
      boolean

    • addSymbolToUser

      boolean addSymbolToUser(User user, String ticker)
      Adds a symbol to a user. This will create a symbol object linked to the user object which can be used to retrieve the saved ticker
      Parameters:
      user -
      ticker - like 'UEC'
      Returns:
      boolean based on the success of the transaction

    • getClientIp

      String getClientIp(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      takes request and finds the user's Ip. Used in place of user id when logging TODO centralize getClientIp into one method {See UserController} to see other method
      Parameters:
      request - HttpServletRequest takes the servlet request received from a post method
      Returns:
      remote IP address
